Reviews.Content: tripadvisor affordable hotel nyc found sohotel fringe little italy downtown staff lovely obliging engaged cleaning carry luggage stairs elevators hotel refitted doesnt look exciting outside inside loud colours exotic prints pictures charming kitschy stuff held double single bed dresser bed tables else ny thrilled renos included lots lights switch control ac overhead fan bathroom little bottles stuff including toothpaste unusual spotlessly clean windows coverings short accommodation city nyc noise night street wasnt bad bed cosy comfy sleep anyway coffee service provided morning breakfast staff provided reference discount card closeby restaurant served lovely breakfast parking 28 day nearby parkade easily walkable dragging luggage train grand nearest subway station couple blocks sohotel reasonable accommodation nyc visit recommend return visit soon hope city wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Most comfortable beds i have EVER slept in”
Reviews.Author: EmmaShannon
Reviews.Content: sohotel decorated clean boutiquetype hotel lies slap bang little italy chinatown downtown manhattan reasonably priced ny size plasma tvs comfortable beds slept im picky own bed pillows despite loving travelling dread soft hotel beds cardboard pillows bed sohotel nights sleeps time downside hotel walls super thin maids morning risers heard loudly

Reviews.Title: “Pictures Don't Do this Hotel Justice!”
Reviews.Author: LovenSoho
Reviews.Content: husband ny weekend stayed numerous hotels paying double price sohotel little sceptical reviews incredibly impressed soho little italy east village les china town walking distance pick negative stair entryway hey excercise extremely nice doorman graciously help bags staff friendy offered shower freshen ready arrived 630am lobby cozy little nooks relax grab coffee balthazar grotta corner breakfastjust perfect price thank sohotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice but a tad pricey”
Reviews.Author: ahoy60
Reviews.Content: location bad pretty central climb stairs lobby stairs elevator receptionists bell person helpful modern decor atmosphere foyer tries hard remodeled clean real thank god bedbugs didnt care plastic sheet wrapped mattress weird sheets 279 using quality mattress protection padding stay

Reviews.Title: “SERVICE WITH A SMILE”
Reviews.Author: Jeanbj
Reviews.Content: recently stood sohotel decent hotel decent staff leisure trip boyfriend time lives 7 nights rm 454 bit worth price staff extra courteous especially pedro luis night guys helped times bags towels batteries remote control pedro store buy aspirin refused money tried tip jenny lovely ladies morning helpful service smile minute walk doors sohotel home nyc love sohotel thank guys stay jeanette

Reviews.Title: “Good location, but a bit noisy”
Reviews.Author: CMcCBelfast
Reviews.Content: hotel looks funky outside reception trendy 3 slept 5 thank goodness werent 5 beds comfortable prooved bit perilous trying bathroom dark floor street bar noisy weekend nights youre try request quiet didnt manage nights sleep warm cooler noisy spent night radiator location mornings cleaner fantastic job folded clothes left spotless comfortable beds noisy night hot noisy air conditioning narrow furniture sore knees probably wouldnt stay againim theres price

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL IN NYC!!! DONT BELIEVE THE BAD REVIEWS!!”
Reviews.Author: skafi
Reviews.Content: 5 staying 1 night nyc people front desk nice leaving bags reception nyc checkin time check easily finallythe roomi gotta surprised beds comfy bathroom nice modern view gotta cares clean crash 1 night paying night staying island subway close 4 street broadway canal street am definitely hotel time nyc friends husband downer dont elevator carry bags

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel on good spot”
Reviews.Author: ivelde
Reviews.Content: chose sohotel 3 day visit york city choice location lots nice restaurants neighborhood staff friendly helpful hotel map nice atmosphere minor improved ac wifi coverage

Reviews.Content: wonderful night stay mom sister town 2 day shopping trip walking distance broadway soho shopping little italy eating hotel staff nice efficient nice check bags arrival departure dragging stuff booked regency plus total 3 beds comfortable little bathroom safe sound hotel walking little street noise local bar closed set earplugs didnt fix talking coming staying

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Location - Don't worry about the Bad reviews”
Reviews.Author: dudestermcghee
Reviews.Content: stayed sohotel nights july 2010 stayed nights unfortunately booked people writing bad reviews competitors extremely nitpicky stay experience hotel ill start negatives electric times fixed quickly times hours whenever plugged luckily fuse box staff ourselves times hopefully fixed bad coffee wasnt location amazing literally 5 minute walk neighborhoods lower manhattan little italy 2 blocks chinatown 12 block lower east east village 34 blocks broadway shopping 4 blocks village 510 blocks loved location main reasons booked customer service outstanding frank ali hopefully names awesome ready help baggage else cant thier names dealt 2 3 ladies front desk stay extremely friendly helpful stayed totally booked hotel price compared neighboring hotels priced walking looking hotel day cheapest soho running 500600 night location prices coming trips extensively arent doing stuff day anyway cares bed extremely comfortable recommend folddown ironing board door front desk barely fits bags set experience sohotel looking staying december staff price location beat recommend travelling york

Reviews.Title: “great spot”
Reviews.Author: Toronto_inspired
Reviews.Content: returned trip nyc 19 wife stayed wonderful time walking distance course tiny goes nyc stay quiet clean staff friendly price paid ideal

Reviews.Title: “America's version of hotel du charm”
Reviews.Author: Burnzi
Reviews.Content: hotel funky staff helpful polite charm appointed comfortable location perfect doing city catch bus chinatown trip niagara falls convenient location bit noisy hard escape noise york

Reviews.Title: “If you're looking for relaxation, don't stay here.”
Reviews.Author: kkhonig
Reviews.Content: theres reason dont dimensions website barely bigger bed 24 hour concierge service theres phone call understand hotel ny site elevators shower stall barely person fancy little bottles shampoo bar soap washcloth matter youre looking bed crash dont mind walking lot stairs doing ton walking day

Reviews.Title: “Great location in NYC”
Reviews.Author: AcademicTraveller44
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect nice clean base soho located safe near vibrancy soho china town little italy quiet nights sleep air conditioning storage isnt restaurant premises theres plenty nearby tea coffee available hotel lobby 7am 11am id definitely recommend hotel friends andor couples families

Reviews.Title: “Poor hotel & terrible customer service”
Reviews.Author: MissSParekh
Reviews.Content: partner stayed hotel york location reviews hotel decent price experienced awful service 2 inadequate ie complained transferred shabbier dirty broken drawers hangers etc incredibly noisy stayed nyc times money expect luxurious huge amazing views located crash pad clean basic covered paying location price unreasonable comparatively stay price complained manager politely care patronised saying shouldnt expect price paying practically laughed bringing elsewhere doesnt deserve custom

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Time, Impressed, and Affordable”
Reviews.Author: melissagordillo
Reviews.Content: sohotel delivered 100 promises arrived night time lights pretty cool building stand staff friendly nice complaint werent knowledgeable downtown activities nightlife theres quick search internet cant fine clean cool design definitely time nyc

Reviews.Title: “Funky, clean, value for money- Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: LondonTraveller1212
Reviews.Content: sohotel exactly looked photos website stayed 4 friends perfect clean helpful staff especially luggage guy carried 10 suitcases modern brick walls funky reception location soho beds broken fixed meantime additional stay excellent value money thanks sohotel

Reviews.Title: “Sohotel Was Good!!!”
Reviews.Author: scr_69
Reviews.Content: arriving sohotel worried hearing reviews clean quit suprised arrived lobby help bags didnt carry bags ok walked people cleaing lobby lobby designed nice retro stayed 3 nights ok beds extremely comfortable travel trips comfortable bed ive slept time definitely night sleep sohotel definitely worth money spent alot restaurants shopping saving extra bucks allowed splurge bit activities ill definitely

Reviews.Title: “Good experience at Sohotel”
Reviews.Author: warwick290
Reviews.Content: wary staying reading negative reviews impressions hotel lead narrow hallway teenagers running eachother screeching college dorm ground floor hallway tiny clean cosy stayed 2 nights slept night wasnt disturbed noise overall pretty stay hotel staff courteous ok flatscreen tv exposed brick wall location wholefoods store blocks grammercy kinds nice food

Reviews.Content: hotel expensive regarding quality bedrooms noisy fire department hotel breakfast change twice booked beds arrived bed changed beds window except window ceiling rained bed wet third day fire alarm 3 am drunk guy activated staff able stop fire drill 2o minutes definitely recommend hotel location five minutes broadway decide wish luck

Reviews.Content: smoking inexpensive clean crash soho staff friendly price location nice ill stay
